page.title: Terms & Conditions
page.subtitle: Please read our terms of service carefully

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using Khulega.online, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

sections.title: 2. Use of Services
sections.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
list: Use the service in any way that violates any applicable law or regulation
Engage in any conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use of the service
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the service
Use the service to transmit any harmful or malicious content

sections.title: 3. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on Khulega.online, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Khulega.online and is protected by intellectual property laws.

sections.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Khulega.online shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of your use of our services.

sections.title: 5. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page.

sections.title: 6. Contact
sections.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at our contact page.
